description: This table contains link(s) to patient record(s) associated with member.

columns.name: BENEFIT_USAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the benefit usage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique patient ID for the member associated with the benefit usage.

columns.name: CARD_ISSUED_DATE
columns.description: The date of the most recent time a card was issued to a member for this benefit usage.
